Package org.am.presentation.controller

package org.am.presentation.controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BillController
    The BillController class controls the actions performed on the BillFrame and communicates with the BillBLL class
    ClientController
    The ClientController class controls the actions performed on the ClientFrame and communicates with the ClientBLL class.
    OrderController
    The OrderController class is responsible for controlling the order-related functionality of the application.
    ProductController
    This class is responsible for controlling the Product related functionality in the UI.
    StartController
    This class represents a controller for the start screen of the application.
